title: Educational Instructor, Tutor (PT)
content:
Position Summary
Responsible for the educational instruction and counsel of Urban Youth Academy members
Essential Functions 

Assist students in varying educational subjects
Teach study skills that prepare students for post-secondary education
Provide an atmosphere conducive to learning and studying
Assist youth in completing and retaining information of academic assignments
Mentor students through interaction in educational activities
Assist in monitoring number of participants in the educational program
Administer Science of Baseball STEM summer and fall programs
Administer ACT and SAT Prep
Council youth on the importance of education and College prep
Other duties as assigned

Required education and experience

Bachelor’s degree
Teaching certification preferred
Minimum of two years of teaching or tutoring experience preferred
Professional demeanor, organized and detail oriented
Strong organizational, interpersonal and communication skills
Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook and PowerPoint programming
Extensive multi-tasking skills and experience with time-sensitive deadlines
Baseball and softball knowledge/acumen is preferred
Experience with office administration preferred

Travel – 25% local overnight travel expected around All Star and Spring Break events.
Per pay transparency law, the hiring range for this position is an hourly rate of $18-23/hr. The actual offer will carefully consider a wide range of factors, including your work experience, education, skills and any other factors Major League Baseball (MLB) considers relevant to the hiring decision.California Residents: Have you reviewed our California Consumer Privacy Act Policy ?
